__e: "And then the Lord laid the sins of the father upon the child. For though he is merciful, even the righteous are born in sin and must bear the iniquities of their fathers."
And I ask you not to judge a daughter by the sins of her father.
Brother, sister... the sins of the father now laid upon the children.
Thinks that he's responsible for his dad's death.
And he feels that it's somehow related to his father's death.
All the things Andrew's been saying and the way he's been acting, it's connected to his father's death.
I baptize you in the name of the Father, and of the son and of the holy ghost, amen.
In the name of the Father, the Son and the Holy Ghost, I cleanse you.
As it is eternally written. In the name of the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit. God bless you all.
